ne16:1.3: Yathā āyasmā ajito pārāyane bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati—
ne16:4.1: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti pañhe “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.
ne16:4.2: “Kenassu nappakāsatī”ti pañhe “vivicchā pamādā nappakāsatī”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.
ne16:4.3: “Kissābhilepanaṃ brūsī”ti pañhe “jappābhilepanaṃ brūmī”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.
ne16:4.4: “Kiṃsu tassa mahabbhayan”ti pañhe “dukkhamassa mahabbhayan”ti suddho ārambho.
ne16:7.1: “Savanti sabbadhi sotā, sotānaṃ kiṃ nivāraṇan”ti pañhe “yāni sotāni lokasmiṃ, sati tesaṃ nivāraṇan”ti bhagavā padaṃ sodheti, no ca ārambhaṃ.
ne16:7.2: “Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi, kena sotā pidhīyare”ti pañhe “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare”ti suddho ārambho.
ne16:11.3: Yattha evaṃ suddho ārambho, so pañho visajjito bhavati.
ne16:11.4: Yattha pana ārambho asuddho, na tāva so pañho visajjito bhavati.
